name: `initial_conc`
Name of bivalve group: Initial concentration of bivalve (mmolC/m2)

name: `min`
Name of bivalve group: Minimum concentration of bivalve (mmolC/m3)

name: `length`
Name of bivalve group: Length of bivalve (mm)

name: `INC`
Name of bivalve group: Ratio of internal nitrogen to carbon of bivalve (-)

name: `IPC`
Name of bivalve group: Ratio of internal phosphorus to carbon of bivalve (-)

name: `Rgrz`
Name of bivalve group: Maximum ingestion rate of bivalve (mmol/mmol/day) (Spillman et al. 2008) Calculated from Schneider 1992 based on 15 mm mussel

name: `Ing`
Name of bivalve group: Type of maximum ingestion for bivalve; 0=Enter (mmol/mmol/d) or 1=Calculate based on length

name: `WaI`
Name of bivalve group: Maximum standard ingestion rate of bivalve (mmol/mmol/day) (Schneider 1992)

name: `WbI`
Name of bivalve group: Exponent for weight effect on ingestion of bivalve (-) (Schneider 1992)

name: `fassim`
Name of bivalve group: Minimum proportion of food lost as pseudofeces for bivalve (-)

name: `Cmin_grz`
Name of bivalve group: Minimum prey concentration for grazing by bivalve (mmolC/m3)

name: `Kgrz`
Name of bivalve group: Optimum algae+POC concentration for ingestion of bivalve (mmol/m3)

name: `minT`
Name of bivalve group: Lower temperature for no ingestion of bivalve (degC)

name: `Tmin`
Name of bivalve group: Lower temperature for optimum ingestion of bivalve (degC)

name: `Tmax`
Name of bivalve group: Upper temperature for optimum ingestion of bivalve (degC)

name: `maxT`
Name of bivalve group: Upper temperature for no ingestion of bivalve (degC)

name: `Dmax`
Name of bivalve group: Upper density for optimum ingestion of bivalve (mmol/m2)

name: `maxD`
Name of bivalve group: Upper density for no ingestion of bivalve (mmol/m2)

name: `Ssmax`
Name of bivalve group: Upper suspended solids for optimum ingestion of bivalve (mg/L)

name: `maxSS`
Name of bivalve group: Upper suspended solids for no ingestion of bivalve (mg/L)

name: `Rexcr`
Name of bivalve group: Excretion fraction of ingestion for bivalve(-)

name: `Regst`
Name of bivalve group: Minimum proportion egested as feces for bivalve (-)

name: `gegst`
Name of bivalve group: Gamma coefficient for food availability dependence for bivalve

name: `Rresp`
Name of bivalve group: Respiration rate coefficient of bivalve (/day) (Calculated from Schneider 1992 based on 15 mm mussel)

name: `saltfunc`
Name of bivalve group: Type of salinity function for bivalve; 0=None or 1=Spillman et al. 2008

name: `minS`
Name of bivalve group: Lower salinity for no ingestion of bivalve (psu)

name: `Smin`
Name of bivalve group: Lower salinity for optimum ingestion of bivalve (psu)

name: `Smax`
Name of bivalve group: Upper salinity for optimum ingestion of bivalve (psu)

name: `maxS`
Name of bivalve group: Upper salinity for no ingestion of bivalve (psu)

name: `fR20`
Name of bivalve group: Type of maximum respiration for bivalve; 0=Enter or 1=Calculate based on length (mm)

name: `War`
Name of bivalve group: Standard respiration rate of bivalve (mmol/mmol/d) (Schneider 1992)

name: `Wbr`
Name of bivalve group: Exponent for weight effect on respiration of bivalve (-)

name: `fR`
Name of bivalve group: Type of respiration function for bivalve; 0=Schneider 1992 or 1=Spillman et al. 2008

name: `theta_resp`
Name of bivalve group: Temperature multiplier for respiration of bivalve (-)

name: `TmaxR`
Name of bivalve group: Upper temperature for optimum respiration of bivalve (degC)

name: `maxTR`
Name of bivalve group: Upper temperature for no respiration of bivalve (degC)

name: `Qresp`
Name of bivalve group: Respiration curve slope estimate for bivalve (-)

name: `SDA`
Name of bivalve group: Specific dynamic action of bivalve (-)

name: `Rmort`
Name of bivalve group: Mortality rate coefficient for bivalve (/day)

name: `Rpred`
Name of bivalve group: Mortality rate from predation of bivalve (/day)

name: `fDO`
Name of bivalve group: Type of dissolved oxygen function for bivalve; 0=None or 1=XXX or 2=XXX

name: `K_BDO`
Name of bivalve group: Basal respiration rate of bivalve (mmol/m3)

name: `KDO`
Name of bivalve group: Half saturation constant for metabolic response to DO for bivalve (mmol/m3)

name: `num_prey`
Name of bivalve group: Number of state variables for bivalve prey

name: `prey(1)%bivalve_prey`
Name of bivalve group: State variable name of bivalve prey

name: `prey(1)%Pbiv_prey`
Name of bivalve group: Preference factors for bivalve predators grazing on prey

name: `prey(2)%bivalve_prey`
Name of bivalve group: State variable name of bivalve prey

name: `prey(2)%Pbiv_prey`
Name of bivalve group: Preference factors for bivalve predators grazing on prey

name: `prey(3)%bivalve_prey`
Name of bivalve group: State variable name of bivalve prey

name: `prey(3)%Pbiv_prey`
Name of bivalve group: Preference factors for bivalve predators grazing on prey
